CHANGES
*******

2.8.2 (2011-01-07)
==================

- Rewrote `hurry.yui`_ to use `fanstatic`_ instead of `hurry.resource`_.

- Use YUI version 2.8.2.

.. _`hurry.yui`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/hurry.yui
.. _`hurry.resource`: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/hurry.resource
.. _`fanstatic`: http://fanstatic.org
